// Then run "python build_kv.py units"

	// npc_dotahs_bane.txt
	//=================================================================================
	// npc_dotahs_bane
	//=================================================================================
	"npc_dotahs_bane"
	{
		// General
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"					"npc_dota_creature"
		"Model"						"models/heroes/bane/bane.mdl"
		"ModelScale"				"0.75"
		"Level"						"1"

		// Precache
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{
			"soundfile"				"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_bane.vsndevts"
			"particle_folder"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_bane"
		}

		"GameSoundsFile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_bane.vsndevts"
		"VoiceFile"					"soundevents/voscripts/game_sounds_vo_bane.vsndevts"

		// Abilities
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"Ability1"					"dotahs_creature_nightmare"
		"Ability2"					""
		"Ability3"					""
		"Ability4"					""
		"Ability5"					""
		"Ability6"					""
		"Ability7"					""
		"Ability8"					""

		// Armor
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"ArmorPhysical"				"1"
		"MagicalResistance"			"50"

		// Attack
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"AttackCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_RANGED_ATTACK"
		"AttackDamageMin"			"33"
		"AttackDamageMax"			"39"
		"AttackRate"				"1.7"
		"AttackAnimationPoint"		"0.3"
		"AttackAcquisitionRange"	"800"
		"AttackRange"				"400"
		"ProjectileModel"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_bane/bane_projectile.vpcf"
		"ProjectileSpeed"			"900"

		// Bounty
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BountyXP"					"25"
		"BountyGoldMin"				"35"
		"BountyGoldMax"				"42"

		// Bounds
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"RingRadius"				"70"
		"HealthBarOffset"			"160"
		"BoundsHullName"			"DOTA_HULL_SIZE_SMALL"

		// Movement
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"MovementCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MOVE_GROUND"
		"MovementSpeed"				"315"
		"MovementTurnRate"			"0.5"

		// Status
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"StatusHealth"				"300"
		"StatusHealthRegen"			"4"
		"StatusMana"				"0"
		"StatusManaRegen"			"0"

		// Team
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"TeamName"					"DOTA_TEAM_BADGUYS"
		"CombatClassAttack"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_ATTACK_BASIC"
		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_SOFT"
		"UnitRelationshipClass"		"DOTA_NPC_UNIT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_DEFAULT"

		// Vision
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"VisionDaytimeRange"		"1400"
		"VisionNighttimeRange"		"1400"

		// Creature Data
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"Creature"
		{
			"CanRespawn"				"0"

			// Basic AI State
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"States"
			{
				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"50"
					"Avoidance"			"100"
					"Support"			"50"
					"RoamDistance"		"700"
				}
			}

			"DefaultState"				"Invade"

			// Level Up Parameters
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"HPGain"					"90"
			"DamageGain"				"4"
			"ArmorGain"					"0"
			"MagicResistGain"			"0"
			"MoveSpeedGain"				"0"
			"BountyGain"				"0"
			"XPGain"					"0"

			// Ability Usage Parameters
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"OffensiveAbilities"
			{
			}

			"DefensiveAbilities"
			{
				"Ability1"
				{
					"Name"				"dotahs_creature_nightmare"
					"Buff"				"1"
				}
			}
		}
	}

	// npc_dotahs_dazzle.txt
	//=================================================================================
	// npc_dotahs_dazzle
	//=================================================================================
	"npc_dotahs_dazzle"
	{
		// General
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"					"npc_dota_creature"
		"Model"						"models/heroes/dazzle/dazzle.vmdl"
		"ModelScale"				"0.85"
		"Level"						"1"

		// Precache
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{
			"soundfile"				"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_dazzle.vsndevts"
			"particle_folder"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_dazzle"
		}

		"GameSoundsFile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_dazzle.vsndevts"
		"VoiceFile"					"soundevents/voscripts/game_sounds_vo_dazzle.vsndevts"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"Ability1"					"dotahs_creature_shallow_grave"
		"Ability2"					"dotahs_creature_shadow_wave"
		"Ability3"					""
		"Ability4"					""
		"Ability5"					""
		"Ability6"					""
		"Ability7"					""
		"Ability8"					""

		// Armor
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"ArmorPhysical"				"-1"
		"MagicalResistance"			"50"

		// Attack
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"AttackCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_RANGED_ATTACK"
		"AttackDamageMin"			"20"
		"AttackDamageMax"			"35"
		"AttackRate"				"1.7"
		"AttackAnimationPoint"		"0.5"
		"AttackAcquisitionRange"	"700"
		"AttackRange"				"530"
		"ProjectileModel"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_dazzle/dazzle_base_attack.vpcf"
		"ProjectileSpeed"			"900"

		// Bounty
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BountyXP"					"25"
		"BountyGoldMin"				"35"
		"BountyGoldMax"				"42"

		// Bounds
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"RingRadius"				"70"
		"HealthBarOffset"			"160"
		"BoundsHullName"			"DOTA_HULL_SIZE_SMALL"

		// Movement
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"MovementCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MOVE_GROUND"
		"MovementSpeed"				"375"
		"MovementTurnRate"			"0.5"

		// Status
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"StatusHealth"				"400"
		"StatusHealthRegen"			"5"
		"StatusMana"				"500"
		"StatusManaRegen"			"2"

		// Team
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"TeamName"					"DOTA_TEAM_BADGUYS"
		"CombatClassAttack"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_ATTACK_BASIC"
		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_SOFT"
		"UnitRelationshipClass"		"DOTA_NPC_UNIT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_DEFAULT"

		// Vision
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"VisionDaytimeRange"		"1400"
		"VisionNighttimeRange"		"1400"

		// Creature Data
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"Creature"
		{
			"CanRespawn"				"0"

			// Basic AI State
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"States"
			{
				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"100"
					"Avoidance"			"5"
					"Support"			"75"
					"RoamDistance"		"600"
				}
			}

			"DefaultState"				"Invade"

			// Level Up Parameters
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"HPGain"					"120"
			"DamageGain"				"3"
			"ArmorGain"					"0"
			"MagicResistGain"			"0"
			"MoveSpeedGain"				"0"
			"BountyGain"				"0"
			"XPGain"					"0"

			// Ability Usage Parameters
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"OffensiveAbilities"
			{

			"DefensiveAbilities"
			{
				"Ability1"
				{
					"Name"				"dotahs_creature_shallow_grave"
					"Buff"				"1"
				}

					"Name"				"dotahs_creature_shadow_wave"

		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_SOFT"

			"CanRespawn"				"0"

			//-----------------------------------------------------------------

			{
				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"100"
					"Avoidance"			"50"
					"Support"			"0"
					"RoamDistance"		"1000"
				}
			}

			//-----------------------------------------------------------------

			"DamageGain"				"6"
			"ArmorGain"					"0"

			"MoveSpeedGain"				"0"

					"Name"				"dotahs_creature_dream_coil"
					"AOE"				"1"
					"Radius"			"300"
					"MinimumTargets"	"1"
				}

					"Name"				"dotahs_creature_phase_shift"

			}

			"particle_folder"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_jakiro"
		}

		"VoiceFile"					"soundevents/voscripts/game_sounds_vo_jakiro.vsndevts"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"Ability2"					"dotahs_creature_macropyre"

		"Ability8"					""

		"MagicalResistance"			"50"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"AttackDamageMax"			"26"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"MovementTurnRate"			"0.5"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"StatusHealthRegen"			"4"
		"StatusMana"				"0"
		"StatusManaRegen"			"0"

		// Team
		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"CombatClassAttack"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_ATTACK_BASIC"
		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_SOFT"
		"UnitRelationshipClass"		"DOTA_NPC_UNIT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_DEFAULT"

		// Vision
		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"VisionNighttimeRange"		"1400"

		// Creature Data
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"Creature"
		{
			"CanRespawn"				"0"

			// Basic AI State
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"States"
			{
				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"100"
					"Avoidance"			"20"
					"Support"			"0"
					"RoamDistance"		"600"
				}
			}

			// Level Up Parameters
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"HPGain"					"105"
			"DamageGain"				"3"
			"ArmorGain"					"0"
			"MagicResistGain"			"0"

	"npc_dotahs_magnus"
	{
		// General

			"soundfile"				"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_magnataur.vsndevts"
			"particle_folder"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_magnataur"
		}

		"VoiceFile"					"soundevents/voscripts/game_sounds_vo_magnataur.vsndevts"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"Ability1"					"dotahs_creature_skewer"
		"Ability2"					""
		"Ability3"					""
		"Ability4"					""
		"Ability5"					""
		"Ability6"					""
		"Ability7"					""
		"Ability8"					""

		// Armor
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"ArmorPhysical"				"4.1"
		"MagicalResistance"			"50"

		// Attack
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"AttackCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MELEE_ATTACK"
		"AttackDamageMin"			"49"
		"AttackDamageMax"			"61"
		"AttackRate"				"1.7"
		"AttackAnimationPoint"		"0.5"
		"AttackAcquisitionRange"	"800"
		"AttackRange"				"128"
		"ProjectileModel"			""
		"ProjectileSpeed"			""

		// Bounty
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BountyXP"					"25"
		"BountyGoldMin"				"35"
		"BountyGoldMax"				"42"

		// Bounds
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"RingRadius"				"70"
		"HealthBarOffset"			"160"
		"BoundsHullName"			"DOTA_HULL_SIZE_SMALL"

		// Movement
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"MovementCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MOVE_GROUND"
		"MovementSpeed"				"375"
		"MovementTurnRate"			"0.5"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"StatusHealth"				"600"
		"StatusHealthRegen"			"12"
		"StatusMana"				"0"
		"StatusManaRegen"			"0"

		// Team
		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"CombatClassAttack"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_ATTACK_BASIC"
		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_SOFT"

		// Vision
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"VisionDaytimeRange"		"1400"
		"VisionNighttimeRange"		"1400"

		// Creature Data
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"Creature"
		{
			"CanRespawn"				"0"

			// Basic AI State
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"States"
			{
				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"100"
					"Avoidance"			"50"
					"Support"			"0"
					"RoamDistance"		"700"
				}
			}

			"DefaultState"				"Invade"

			// Level Up Parameters
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------

			"DamageGain"				"11"
			"ArmorGain"					"0"

	{

		}

		"VoiceFile"					"soundevents/voscripts/game_sounds_vo_nevermore.vsndevts"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"Ability8"					""

		// Attack
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"AttackCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_RANGED_ATTACK"
		"AttackDamageMin"			"15"
		"AttackDamageMax"			"21"
		"AttackRate"				"1.7"
		"AttackAnimationPoint"		"0.5"
		"AttackAcquisitionRange"	"800"
		"AttackRange"				"500"
		"ProjectileModel"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_nevermore/nevermore_base_attack.vpcf"
		"ProjectileSpeed"			"1200"

		// Bounty
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BountyXP"					"25"
		"BountyGoldMin"				"35"
		"BountyGoldMax"				"42"

		// Bounds
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"RingRadius"				"70"
		"HealthBarOffset"			"160"
		"BoundsHullName"			"DOTA_HULL_SIZE_SMALL"

		// Movement
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"MovementCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MOVE_GROUND"
		"MovementSpeed"				"325"
		"MovementTurnRate"			"0.5"

		// Status
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"StatusHealth"				"350"
		"StatusHealthRegen"			"0"
		"StatusMana"				"500"
		"StatusManaRegen"			"0"

		// Team
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"TeamName"					"DOTA_TEAM_BADGUYS"
		"CombatClassAttack"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_ATTACK_BASIC"
		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_SOFT"
		"UnitRelationshipClass"		"DOTA_NPC_UNIT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_DEFAULT"

		// Vision
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"VisionDaytimeRange"		"1400"
		"VisionNighttimeRange"		"1400"

		// Creature Data
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"Creature"
		{
			"CanRespawn"				"0"

			// Basic AI State
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"States"
			{
				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"100"
					"Avoidance"			"20"
					"Support"			"0"
					"RoamDistance"		"450"
				}
			}

			"DefaultState"				"Invade"

			// Level Up Parameters
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"HPGain"					"105"
			"DamageGain"				"2"
			"ArmorGain"					"0"
			"MagicResistGain"			"0"
			"MoveSpeedGain"				"0"
			"BountyGain"				"0"
			"XPGain"					"0"

			//-----------------------------------------------------------------

			{
				"Ability1"
				{
					"Name"				"dotahs_creature_shadowraze1"
					"AOE"				"1"
					"Radius"			"200"
					"MinimumTargets"	"1"
				}
				"Ability2"
				{
					"Name"				"dotahs_creature_shadowraze2"

					"Radius"			"700"
					"MinimumTargets"	"1"
				}
			}

	"npc_dotahs_nyxnyxnyx"

	"npc_dotahs_rattletrap"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"Ability6"					""
		"Ability7"					""
		"Ability8"					""

		// Armor
		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"MagicalResistance"			"50"

		// Attack
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"AttackCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MELEE_ATTACK"
		"AttackDamageMin"			"31"
		"AttackDamageMax"			"33"

		"AttackAnimationPoint"		"0.33"
		"AttackAcquisitionRange"	"600"
		"AttackRange"				"128"
		"ProjectileModel"			""
		"ProjectileSpeed"			""

		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BountyXP"					"25"
		"BountyGoldMin"				"35"
		"BountyGoldMax"				"42"

		// Bounds
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"RingRadius"				"70"
		"HealthBarOffset"			"160"
		"BoundsHullName"			"DOTA_HULL_SIZE_SMALL"

		// Movement
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"MovementCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MOVE_GROUND"
		"MovementSpeed"				"400"
		"MovementTurnRate"			"0.5"

		// Status
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"StatusHealth"				"450"
		"StatusHealthRegen"			"8"
		"StatusMana"				"0"
		"StatusManaRegen"			"0"

		// Team
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"TeamName"					"DOTA_TEAM_BADGUYS"
		"CombatClassAttack"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_ATTACK_BASIC"
		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_SOFT"
		"UnitRelationshipClass"		"DOTA_NPC_UNIT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_DEFAULT"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"VisionNighttimeRange"		"1400"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"Creature"
		{
			"CanRespawn"				"0"

			"DisableResistance"			"30"

			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"States"
			{
				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"100"
					"Avoidance"			"0"
					"Support"			"0"
					"RoamDistance"		"0"
				}

			//-----------------------------------------------------------------

			"DamageGain"				"7"
			"ArmorGain"					"0"
			"MagicResistGain"			"0"
			"MoveSpeedGain"				"0"
			"BountyGain"				"0"
			"XPGain"					"0"

					"AOE"				"1"
					"Radius"			"150"
					"MinimumTargets"	"1"

	// npc_dotahs_tusk

	"npc_dotahs_hostage"

		"MovementSpeed"				"350"		// Speed
		"MovementTurnRate"			"0.5"		// Turning rate.
	
		// Bounty

		"BountyGoldMin"				"150"		// Gold earned min.
		"BountyGoldMax"				"150"		// Gold earned max.

		"StatusHealthRegen"			"666"		// Health regeneration rate.
		"StatusMana"				"0"			// Base mana.
		"StatusManaRegen"			"0"			// Mana regeneration rate.

		"CombatClassAttack"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_ATTACK_BASIC"
		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_SOFT"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"VisionNighttimeRange"		"350"		// Range of vision at night time.

		// Bots
		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		//Inventory

	}
	
	// units_holdout_wave11.txt
	// Wave 11: Danger Zone
	//    8 x npc_dota_creature_missile_launcher
	//	 20 x npc_dota_creature_rattletrap
	
	//=================================================================================
	// Creature: Homing Missle Launcher
	//=================================================================================
	"npc_dota_creature_missile_launcher"
	{
		// General
		//
		"BaseClass"					"npc_dota_creature"					// Class of entity of link to.
		"Model"						"models/heroes/gyro/gyro.vmdl"		// Model.
		"SoundSet"					"Hero_Gyrocopter"					// Name of sound set.
		"GameSoundsFile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_gyrocopter.vsndevts"
		"ModelScale"				".9"
		"Level"						"1"
		"CanBeDominated"			"0"
		"UsesConstantGesture"		"1"

		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{
			"model"					"models/heroes/gyro/gyro_missile.vmdl"
			"soundfile"				"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_gyrocopter.vsndevts"
			"particle_folder"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_gyrocopter"
		}
		
		// Abilities
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"Ability1"					"holdout_gyrocopter_homing_missile"			// Ability 1
		"Ability2"					""			// Ability 2.
		"Ability3"					""			// Ability 3.
		"Ability4"					""			// Ability 4.
		"Ability5"					""			// Ability 5.
		"Ability6"					""			// Ability 6 - Extra.
		"Ability7"					""			// Ability 7 - Extra.
		"Ability8"					""			// Ability 8 - Extra.

		// Armor
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"ArmorPhysical"				"12"			// Physical protection.
		"MagicalResistance"			"35"		// Magical protection.

		// Attack
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"AttackCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_RANGED_ATTACK"
		"AttackDamageMin"			"12"		// Damage range min.
		"AttackDamageMax"			"14"		// Damage range max.
		"AttackDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_ArmorPhysical"
		"AttackRate"				"1"			// Speed of attack.
		"AttackAnimationPoint"		"0.3"		// Normalized time in animation cycle to attack.
		"AttackAcquisitionRange"	"1500"		// Range within a target can be acquired.
		"AttackRange"				"1050"		// Range within a target can be attacked.
		"ProjectileModel"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_gyrocopter/gyro_base_attack.vpcf"							// Particle system model for projectile.
		"ProjectileSpeed"			"3000"			// Speed of projectile.

		// Bounty
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BountyXP"					"93"		// Experience earn.
		"BountyGoldMin"				"5"			// Gold earned min.
		"BountyGoldMax"				"7"			// Gold earned max.

		// Bounds
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"RingRadius"				"70"
		"HealthBarOffset"			"160"
		"BoundsHullName"			"DOTA_HULL_SIZE_REGULAR"	

		// Movement
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"MovementCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MOVE_GROUND"			// Type of locomotion - ground, air
		"MovementSpeed"				"500"		// Speed
		"MovementTurnRate"			"0.25"		// Turning rate.

		// Status
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"StatusHealth"				"1250"//"2500"		// Base health.
		"StatusHealthRegen"			"0.25"		// Health regeneration rate.
		"StatusMana"				"600"		// Base mana.
		"StatusManaRegen"			"4"			// Mana regeneration rate.

		// Team
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"TeamName"					"DOTA_TEAM_BADGUYS"			// Team name.
		"CombatClassAttack"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_ATTACK_BASIC"
		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_SOFT"
		"UnitRelationshipClass"		"DOTA_NPC_UNIT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_DEFAULT"
		
		// Vision
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"VisionDaytimeRange"		"1500"		// Range of vision during day light.
		"VisionNighttimeRange"		"1500"		// Range of vision at night time.

		"vscripts"					"gyrocopter_ai.lua"

		// Creature Data
		//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"Creature"
		{
			"CanRespawn"				"0"

			//Basic AI State
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"DefaultState"				"Invade"
			"States"
			{
				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"100.0"
					"Avoidance"			"80.0"
					"Support"			"0.0"
				}
			}

			//Level Up Parameters
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"HPGain"					"75"
			"DamageGain"				"10"
			"ArmorGain"					"1"
			"MagicResistGain"			"1"
			"MoveSpeedGain"				"1"
			"BountyGain"				"5"
			"XPGain"					"20"

			//Ability Usage Parameters
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------
			"OffensiveAbilities"
			{
				"Ability1"
				{
					"Name"				"holdout_gyrocopter_homing_missile"
					"Damage"			"1"
					"Stun"				"1"
				}
			}
			
			"AttachWearables"
			{
				"Wearable1"
				{
					"ItemDef"			"126"
				}
				"Wearable2"
				{
					"ItemDef"			"131"
				}
				"Wearable3"
				{
					"ItemDef"			"176"
				}
				"Wearable4"
				{
					"ItemDef"			"177"
				}
				"Wearable5"
				{
					"ItemDef"			"178"
				}
				"Wearable6"
				{
					"ItemDef"			"179"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	//=================================================================================================================
	// Creature: Rattletrap
	//=================================================================================================================
	"npc_dota_creature_rattletrap"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"					"npc_dota_creature"					// Class of entity of link to.
		"Model"						"models/heroes/rattletrap/rattletrap.vmdl"		// Model.
		"SoundSet"					"Hero_Rattletrap"													// Name of sound set.
		"GameSoundsFile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_rattletrap.vsndevts"
		"ModelScale" 				".825"
		"Level"						"1"
		"CanBeDominated"			"0"

		// Armor
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"ArmorPhysical"				"10"								// Physical protection.

		// Attack
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AttackCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MELEE_ATTACK"
		"AttackDamageMin"			"86"									// Damage range min.
		"AttackDamageMax"			"110"									// Damage range max.
		"AttackRate"				"1.2"									// Speed of attack.
		"AttackAnimationPoint"		"0.33"									// Normalized time in animation cycle to attack.
		"AttackAcquisitionRange"	"600"									// Range within a target can be acquired.
		"AttackRange"				"128"									// Range within a target can be attacked.

		// Bounds
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"RingRadius"				"70"
		"HealthBarOffset"			"215"

		// Bounty
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BountyXP"					"200"		// Experience earn.
		"BountyGoldMin"				"300"		// Gold earned min.
		"BountyGoldMax"				"300"		// Gold earned max.

		// Movement
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"MovementCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MOVE_GROUND"
		"MovementSpeed"				"250"		// Speed.
		"MovementTurnRate"			"0.6"		// Turning rate.

		// Status
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"StatusHealth"				"1500"//"3000"		// Base health.
		"StatusHealthRegen"			"2"			// Health regeneration rate.
		"StatusMana"				"3000"		// Base mana.
		"StatusManaRegen"			"5.0"		// Mana regeneration rate.		 
		
		// Vision
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"VisionDaytimeRange"		"1400"		// Range of vision during day light.
		"VisionNighttimeRange"		"800"		// Range of vision at night time.

		// Team
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"TeamName"					"DOTA_TEAM_NEUTRALS"							// Team name.
		"CombatClassAttack"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_ATTACK_BASIC"
		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_STRONG"
		"UnitRelationshipClass"		"DOTA_NPC_UNIT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_DEFAULT"

		//Precache
		//---------------------------------------------------------------------

		"GameSoundsFile"		"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_rattletrap.vsndevts"

		{
		}
	}

	//=================================================================================
	// Creature: Minor Lich
	//=================================================================================
	"npc_dota_creature_minor_lich"
	{
		// General
		//

		"Level"						"1"

		"Ability5"					""			// Ability 5.
		"Ability6"					""			// Ability 6 - Extra.
		"Ability7"					""			// Ability 7 - Extra.

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"MagicalResistance"			"35"		// Magical protection.

		// Attack
		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"AttackDamageMin"			"40"								// Damage range min.
		"AttackDamageMax"			"55"								// Damage range max.
		"AttackRate"				"1.6"								// Speed of attack.
		"AttackAnimationPoint"		"0.3"								// Normalized time in animation cycle to attack.
		"AttackAcquisitionRange"	"800"								// Range within a target can be acquired.
		"AttackRange"				"600"								// Range within a target can be attacked.
		"ProjectileModel"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_lich/lich_base_attack.vpcf"					// Particle system model for projectile.
		"ProjectileSpeed"			"800"								// Speed of projectile.

		// Bounty
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BountyXP"					"25"		// Experience earn.
		"BountyGoldMin"				"35"		// Gold earned min.
		"BountyGoldMax"				"42"		// Gold earned max.

		// Bounds
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"RingRadius"				"70"
		"HealthBarOffset"			"200"
		"BoundsHullName"			"DOTA_HULL_SIZE_SMALL"

		// Movement
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"MovementCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MOVE_GROUND"			// Type of locomotion - ground, air
		"MovementSpeed"				"265"		// Speed
		"MovementTurnRate"			"0.5"		// Turning rate.
		
		"GameSoundsFile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_lich.vsndevts"
		"VoiceFile"					"soundevents/voscripts/game_sounds_vo_lich.vsndevts"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"StatusHealth"				"1500"//"1800"			// Base health.
		"StatusHealthRegen"			"5.0"			// Health regeneration rate.
		"StatusMana"				"1000"			// Base mana.
		"StatusManaRegen"			"2.0"			// Mana regeneration rate.

		// Team
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"TeamName"					"DOTA_TEAM_BADGUYS"			// Team name.
		"CombatClassAttack"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_ATTACK_BASIC"
		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_SOFT"
		"UnitRelationshipClass"		"DOTA_NPC_UNIT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_DEFAULT"
		
		// Vision
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"VisionDaytimeRange"		"1400"		// Range of vision during day light.
		"VisionNighttimeRange"		"1400"		// Range of vision at night time.

		// Creature Data
		//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"Creature"
		{
			"CanRespawn"				"0"
			"States"
			{
				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"100.0"
					"Avoidance"			"30.0"
					"Support"			"0.0"
					"RoamDistance"		"700.0"
				}
			}

			"DefaultState"				"Invade"
			
			"OffensiveAbilities"
			{
				"Ability1"				
				{
					"Name"				"creature_minor_chain_frost"
					"AOE"				"1"
					"Radius"			"575"
					"MinimumTargets"	"2"
				}
			}
			
			"AttachWearables"
			{
				"Wearable1"	{ "ItemDef" "331" }
				"Wearable2"	{ "ItemDef"	"332" }
				"Wearable3" { "ItemDef"	"333" }
				"Wearable4" { "ItemDef"	"334" }
			}
		}

		"MovementTurnRate"			"0.5"		// Turning rate.

		"StatusMana"				"0"			// Base mana.
		"StatusManaRegen"			"0"			// Mana regeneration rate.

			"CanRespawn"				"0"

			{
				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"100.0"
					"Avoidance"			"0.0"
					"Support"			"0.0"
				}
			}

			//-----------------------------------------------------------------

			"DamageGain"				"10"
			"ArmorGain"					"1"
			"MagicResistGain"			"1"
			"MoveSpeedGain"				"1"

			"XPGain"					"20"

	//=================================================================================
	// Creature: Basic Zombie Exploding
	//=================================================================================
	"npc_dota_creature_basic_zombie_exploding"
	{
		// General
		//
		"BaseClass"					"npc_dota_creature"	// Class of entity of link to.
		"Model"						"models/heroes/undying/undying_minion.vmdl"	// Model.

		"ModelScale"				"1.18"
		"Level"						"1"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		
		"Ability1"					"creature_acid_spray"			// Ability 1.
		"Ability2"					""			// Ability 2.
		"Ability3"					""			// Ability 3.
		"Ability4"					""			// Ability 4.
		"Ability5"					""			// Ability 5.
		"Ability6"					""			// Ability 6 - Extra.
		"Ability7"					""			// Ability 7 - Extra.
		"Ability8"					""			// Ability 8 - Extra.

		// Armor
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"ArmorPhysical"				"3"			// Physical protection.
		"MagicalResistance"			"33"		// Magical protection.

		// Attack
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"AttackCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MELEE_ATTACK"
		"AttackDamageMin"			"37"		// Damage range min.
		"AttackDamageMax"			"45"		// Damage range max.
		"AttackRate"				"1.6"		// Speed of attack.
		"AttackAnimationPoint"		"0.3"		// Normalized time in animation cycle to attack.
		"AttackAcquisitionRange"	"800"		// Range within a target can be acquired.
		"AttackRange"				"128"		// Range within a target can be attacked.
		"ProjectileModel"			""			// Particle system model for projectile.
		"ProjectileSpeed"			""			// Speed of projectile.

		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BountyXP"					"35"	// Experience earn.
		"BountyGoldMin"				"5"		// Gold earned min.
		"BountyGoldMax"				"7"		// Gold earned max.

		// Bounds
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"RingRadius"				"70"
		"HealthBarOffset"			"200"
		"BoundsHullName"			"DOTA_HULL_SIZE_SMALL"	

		// Movement
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"MovementCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MOVE_GROUND"			// Type of locomotion - ground, air
		"MovementSpeed"				"85"		// Speed
		"MovementTurnRate"			"0.5"		// Turning rate.

		// Status
		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"StatusHealthRegen"			"0.25"		// Health regeneration rate.
		"StatusMana"				"0"			// Base mana.
		"StatusManaRegen"			"0"			// Mana regeneration rate.

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"CombatClassAttack"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_ATTACK_PIERCE"
		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_SOFT"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		{

			//-----------------------------------------------------------------

			{
				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"100.0"
					"Avoidance"			"0.0"
					"Support"			"0.0"
				}

			"DamageGain"				"10"
			"ArmorGain"					"1"
			"MagicResistGain"			"1"

		"StatusManaRegen"			"0"			// Mana regeneration rate.

		{
			"CanRespawn"				"0"

				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"100.0"
					"Avoidance"			"0.0"
				}
			}

				"Ability1"

					"Name"				"creature_slithereen_crush"

					"MinimumTargets"	"2"
				}

					"Name"				"creature_sprint"
				}
			}

			{
				"Wearable1"
				{
					"ItemDef"			"273"		
				}

	// units_holdout_wave7.txt
	// Wave 7: Burn Notice
	//    9 x npc_dota_creature_mini_roshan
	//   18 x npc_dota_creature_tormented_soul
	
	//=================================================================================
	// Creature: Mini Roshan
	//=================================================================================
	"npc_dota_creature_mini_roshan"
	{
		// General
		//
		"BaseClass"					"npc_dota_creature"	// Class of entity of link to.
		"Model"						"models/creeps/roshan/roshan.vmdl"	// Model.
		"SoundSet"					"Roshan"					// Name of sound set.
		"ModelScale"				".65"
		"Level"						"1"
		"ConsideredHero"			"1"
		
		// Abilities
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"Ability1"					"creature_fire_breath"	// Ability 1.
		"Ability2"					"generic_gold_bag_fountain_500"			// Ability 2.
		"Ability3"					""			// Ability 3.
		"Ability4"					""			// Ability 4.
		"Ability5"					""			// Ability 5.
		"Ability6"					""			// Ability 6 - Extra.
		"Ability7"					""			// Ability 7 - Extra.
		"Ability8"					""			// Ability 8 - Extra.

		// Armor
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"ArmorPhysical"				"7"			// Physical protection.
		"MagicalResistance"			"50"		// Magical protection (percentage).

		// Attack
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"AttackCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MELEE_ATTACK"
		"AttackDamageMin"			"75"//"200"		// Damage range min.
		"AttackDamageMax"			"125"//"300"		// Damage range max.
		"AttackDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_ArmorPhysical"
		"AttackRate"				"1"			// Speed of attack.
		"AttackAnimationPoint"		"0.3"		// Normalized time in animation cycle to attack.
		"AttackAcquisitionRange"	"800"		// Range within a target can be acquired.
		"AttackRange"				"128"		// Range within a target can be attacked.
		"ProjectileModel"			"particles/base_attacks/ranged_goodguy.vpcf" // Particle system model for projectile.
		"ProjectileSpeed"			"1000"		// Speed of projectile.

		// Bounty
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BountyXP"					"100"		// Experience earn.
		"BountyGoldMin"				"105"		// Gold earned min.
		"BountyGoldMax"				"125"		// Gold earned max.

		// Bounds
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BoundsHullName"			"DOTA_HULL_SIZE_HERO"			// Hull type used for navigation/locomotion.
		"RingRadius"				"60"
		"HealthBarOffset"			"200"

		// Movement
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"MovementCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_MOVE_GROUND"			// Type of locomotion - ground, air
		"MovementSpeed"				"270"		// Speed
		"MovementTurnRate"			"1.0"		// Turning rate.

		// Status
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"StatusHealth"				"1500"		// Base health.
		"StatusHealthRegen"			"20"		// Health regeneration rate.
		"StatusMana"				"250"		// Base mana.
		"StatusManaRegen"			"5"			// Mana regeneration rate.

		// Team
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"TeamName"					"DOTA_TEAM_NEUTRALS"			// Team name.
		"CombatClassAttack"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_ATTACK_LIGHT"
		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_STRONG"
		"UnitRelationshipClass"		"DOTA_NPC_UNIT_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_DEFAULT"
		
		// Vision
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"VisionDaytimeRange"		"1400"		// Range of vision during day light.
		"VisionNighttimeRange"		"1400"		// Range of vision at night time.

		// Creature Data
		//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"Creature"
		{
			"CanRespawn"				"0"
			"States"
			{
				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"100.0"
					"Avoidance"			"0.0"
					"Support"			"0.0"
				}
			}

			"DefaultState"				"Invade"

			"OffensiveAbilities"
			{
				"Ability1"				
				{
					"Name"				"creature_fire_breath"
					"AOE"				"1"
					"Radius"			"650"
					"MinimumTargets"	"1"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	//=================================================================================
	// Creature: Tormented Soul
	//=================================================================================
	"npc_dota_creature_tormented_soul"
	{
		// General
		//
		"BaseClass"					"npc_dota_creature"	// Class of entity of link to.
		"Model"						"models/heroes/leshrac/leshrac.vmdl"	// Model.
		"ModelScale"				"0.75"
		"Level"						"1"
		
		// Abilities
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		
		"Ability1"					"creature_aoe_spikes"			// Ability 1.
		"Ability2"					""			// Ability 2.
		"Ability3"					""			// Ability 3.
		"Ability4"					""			// Ability 4.
		"Ability5"					""			// Ability 5.
		"Ability6"					""			// Ability 6 - Extra.
		"Ability7"					""			// Ability 7 - Extra.
		"Ability8"					""			// Ability 8 - Extra.

		// Armor
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"ArmorPhysical"				"5"			// Physical protection.
		"MagicalResistance"			"33"		// Magical protection.

		// Attack
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"AttackCapabilities"		"DOTA_UNIT_CAP_RANGED_ATTACK"
		"AttackDamageMin"			"40"		// Damage range min.
		"AttackDamageMax"			"55"		// Damage range max.
		"AttackRate"				"1.6"		// Speed of attack.
		"AttackAnimationPoint"		"0.3"		// Normalized time in animation cycle to attack.
		"AttackAcquisitionRange"	"800"		// Range within a target can be acquired.
		"AttackRange"				"600"		// Range within a target can be attacked.
		"ProjectileModel"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_leshrac/leshrac_base_attack.vpcf"						// Particle system model for projectile.
		"ProjectileSpeed"			"800"			// Speed of projectile.

		// Bounty
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"BountyXP"					"25"		// Experience earn.
		"BountyGoldMin"				"35"		// Gold earned min.
		"BountyGoldMax"				"42"		// Gold earned max.

		// Bounds
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"RingRadius"				"70"
		"HealthBarOffset"			"160"
		"BoundsHullName"			"DOTA_HULL_SIZE_SMALL"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"MovementTurnRate"			"0.5"		// Turning rate.

		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"StatusHealth"				"550"		// Base health.
		"StatusHealthRegen"			"5.0"		// Health regeneration rate.
		"StatusMana"				"500"			// Base mana.
		"StatusManaRegen"			"0"			// Mana regeneration rate.

		// Team
		//----------------------------------------------------------------
		"TeamName"					"DOTA_TEAM_BADGUYS"			// Team name.
		"CombatClassAttack"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_ATTACK_BASIC"
		"CombatClassDefend"			"DOTA_COMBAT_CLASS_DEFEND_SOFT"

		//----------------------------------------------------------------

		"VisionNighttimeRange"		"1400"		// Range of vision at night time.

		//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		{
			"CanRespawn"				"0"
			"States"
			{
				"Invade"
				{
					"Name"				"Invade"
					"Aggression"		"100.0"
					"Avoidance"			"30.0"
					"Support"			"0.0"

}
